Public Class methods

parameter(name)

[Source]

    # File lib/alchemy/configuration.rb, line 3
 3:   def self.parameter(name)
 4:     if name.class == String
 5:       name = name.to_sym
 6:     end
 7:     if File.exists? "#{RAILS_ROOT}/config/alchemy/config_#{RAILS_ENV}.yml"
 8:       config_1 = YAML.load_file( "#{RAILS_ROOT}/config/alchemy/config_#{RAILS_ENV}.yml" )
 9:     else
10:       config_1 = {}
11:     end
12:     if File.exists? "#{RAILS_ROOT}/config/alchemy/config.yml"
13:       config_2 = YAML.load_file( "#{RAILS_ROOT}/config/alchemy/config.yml" )
14:     else
15:       config_2 = {}
16:     end
17:     if File.exists? "#{RAILS_ROOT}/vendor/plugins/alchemy/config/alchemy/config.yml"
18:       config_3 = YAML.load_file( "#{RAILS_ROOT}/vendor/plugins/alchemy/config/alchemy/config.yml" )
19:     else
20:       config_3 = {}
21:     end
22:     @config = config_3.merge(config_2.merge(config_1))
23:     return @config[name]
24:   end
sortable_contents(page, element)

[Source]

    # File lib/alchemy/configuration.rb, line 38
38:   def self.sortable_contents(page, element)
39:     page.sortable(
40:       "element_#{element.id}_contents",
41:       :scroll => 'window',
42:       :tag => 'div',
43:       :only => 'dragable_picture',
44:       :handle => 'picture_handle',
45:       :constraint => '',
46:       :overlap => 'horizontal',
47:       :url => "/admin/contents/order?element_id=#{element.id}"
48:     )
49:   end
sortable_elements(page)

[Source]

    # File lib/alchemy/configuration.rb, line 26
26:   def self.sortable_elements(page)
27:     page.sortable(
28:       "element_area",
29:       :url => "/admin/elements/order",
30:       :scroll => "window",
31:       :tag => 'div',
32:       :only => 'element_editor',
33:       :dropOnEmpty => false,
34:       :handle => 'element_handle'
35:     )
36:   end
